subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Angels’ Francisco Rodríguez, who has not been asked to get more than three outs once this season, is on the verge of Bobby Thigpen’s single-season record of 57 saves.
snippet: The Angels’ Francisco Rodríguez, who has not been asked to get more than three outs once this season, is on the verge of Bobby Thigpen’s single-season record of 57 saves.
